snippet: Duran Duran, Stereophonics, Snow Patrol and Paolo Nutini are to perform in Hyde Park on July 27 for the opening of the Olympics in London.
abstract: Duran Duran, Stereophonics, Snow Patrol and Paolo Nutini are to perform in Hyde Park on July 27 for the opening of the Olympics in London.

headline.main: Pop Acts Chosen for Opening of Olympics
headline.print_headline: Pop Acts Chosen For Olympics Opening
